title: Community Treasury Proposal: Miguel Vias for Liquidity Growth Strategies
body:
**Abstract**
This proposal recommends engaging Miguel Vias for the development of liquidity growth strategies for the Rally network. 

**Details**
Miguel Vias is a payments and cryptocurrency markets expert particularly focused on developing liquidity growth strategies for early-stage products and projects. He recently served as Head of XRP Markets at Ripple, where he managed a team that drove XRP liquidity growth, as well as the adoption of the company’s flagship remittance product, the first ever to commercially use a digital currency as a bridge asset. Before Ripple he was in charge of the precious metals product team at CME Group, the largest derivatives exchange in the world. Miguel currently sits on the Board of Directors of Digital Asset Management and is an advisor to Addigy and Linqto, where he helps with liquidity growth for the platform’s offerings.

Miguel is interested in lending his expertise to open up new strategies for Rally to drive its liquidity and growth. His network is massive, and his knowledge of the cryptocurrency payments space, crypto market strategies, and drivers for growth is powerful and unique. His collaboration with the Rally network would be instrumental for the community’s growth.

Check out his intro video and full the Discourse discussion here: 
https://forum.rally.io/t/community-engagement-proposal-miguel-vias-for-liquidity-growth-strategies/942

The proposed engagement terms will be as follows:

 - 166,667 $RLY per month for a period of 5 months from Advisors and Collaborators pool, plus $25K USDC per month from the Rally community treasury.
 - Full-time focus on Rally.
 - During this period, KPIs will be established and achievements will be shared with the community for review.
 - At the end of the 5 month period, unless the community and Miguel would like to renew the engagement, the intention is for this advisory arrangement to end.

 **A YES vote for this proposal would approve Miguel Vias to assist the Rally network with liquidity growth strategies based on the terms detailed above.**

**A NO vote will result in no engagement.**
author: 0xADdC94AD74251792E52A4851591665ea0E8f7389
